title: Chapter 716 - This Treasure And I Are Connected By Fate
body:
Chapter 716 - This Treasure And I Are Connected By Fate

“This…” Pu Hongqian’s pupils dilated. It was as if he’d been struck by lightning.

Pu Surong, A’Leng, and Ruo Huan were struck dumb.

This scene was just too unbelievable. It completely overturned their perception.

They couldn’t even imagine it. The Baleful Metal Gourd was an ancestral treasure of the Purple Moon Foxes. Why was it that Su Yi seemed like its natural enemy? He’d sealed its power completely!

Su Yi then raised his hand and smacked the air.

Bang! Bang! Bang!

Explosions rang out in rapid succession.

The metal Dao Swords trapped in midair shattered, transforming into bundles of glittering baleful metal qi.

Then, they flooded toward Su Yi’s palm, like rivers returning to their source.

This scene shocked everyone present.

“Dammit!” Pu Hongqian jumped as if he’d been electrocuted. He was completely frantic.

He was just about to attack again when Su Yi smiled and beckoned to the Baleful Metal Gourd hovering above Pu Hongqian’s head. “Come here.”

Weng!

The Baleful Metal Gourd trembled, then broke free of Pu Hongqian’s control. It blurred into a dazzling streak of light, and in a flash, it arrived in front of Su Yi.

Like a swallow returning to its nest,...
